sentences: Ma annaksin sulle kõik, mis mul on
Ta annaksin end ära, et aidata teisi
Me annaksin kogu meie raha heategevuseks
translation: I would give you everything I have
He would give himself away to help others
We would give all our money for charity
context: The word 'annaksin' is the first person singular conditional form of the verb 'andma', which means 'to give'. It is used to express a hypothetical or uncertain situation in which the speaker would give something.
